## Demographic Characteristics

This table presents demographic information from the lupus research dataset.

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(dplyr)
library(gtsummary)
```

```{r}
#| label: load-data

# Load the working dataset
d1 <- rio::import("../data/stage1.rds")
```

```{r}
#| label: demographics-table

# Select demographic variables
demographics <- d1 %>%
  select(
    sex,
    age_at_biopsy
  )

# Create gtsummary table stratified by sex
demographics %>%
  tbl_summary(
    by = sex,
    label = list(
      age_at_biopsy ~ "Age at Biopsy"
    ),
    missing = "no"
  ) %>%
  add_overall() %>%
  add_p() %>%
  modify_caption("**Table 1. Demographic Characteristics by Sex**") %>%
  bold_labels()
```
